lyrics.text:
Victim Divine, thy grace we claim while thus thy precious death we show; once offered up, a spotless Lamb,
in thy great temple here below, thou didst for all our kind atone, and standest now before the throne.

The smoke of thy atonement here darkened the sun and rent the veil, made the new way to heaven appear,
and showed the great Invisible; well pleased in thee our God looked down, and called his rebels to a crown.

We need not now go up to heaven, to bring the long sought Savior down; thou art to all already given,
thou dost e'en now thy banquet crown: To every faithful soul appear, and show thy real presence here!
